017package org.apache.juneau.http.entity;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.IOUtils.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.nio.charset.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.function.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
029
030/**
031 * A repeatable entity that obtains its content from a {@link File}.
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
034 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
035 * </ul>
036 */
037@FluentSetters
038public class FileEntity extends BasicHttpEntity {
039
040   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
041   // Instance
042   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
043
044   private byte[] byteCache;
045   private String stringCache;
046
047   /**
048    * Constructor.
049    */
050   public FileEntity() {
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Constructor.
055    *
056    * @param contentType The entity content type.
057    * @param content The entity contents.
058    */
059   public FileEntity(ContentType contentType, File content) {
060      super(contentType, content);
061   }
062
063   /**
064    * Copy constructor.
065    *
066    * @param copyFrom The bean being copied.
067    */
068   protected FileEntity(FileEntity copyFrom) {
069      super(copyFrom);
070   }
071
072   @Override
073   public FileEntity copy() {
074      return new FileEntity(this);
075   }
076
077   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
078   // Other methods
079   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081   private File content() {
082      File f = contentOrElse((File)null);
083      Objects.requireNonNull(f, "File");
084      if (! f.exists())
085         throw new IllegalStateException("File " + f.getAbsolutePath() + " does not exist.");
086      if (! f.canRead())
087         throw new IllegalStateException("File " + f.getAbsolutePath() + " is not readable.");
088      return f;
089   }
090
091   @Override /* AbstractHttpEntity */
092   public String asString() throws IOException {
093      if (isCached() && stringCache == null)
094         stringCache = read(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(content()), getCharset()), getMaxLength());
095      if (stringCache != null)
096         return stringCache;
097      return read(new InputStreamReader(new FileInputStream(content()), getCharset()), getMaxLength());
098   }
099
100   @Override /* AbstractHttpEntity */
101   public byte[] asBytes() throws IOException {
102      if (isCached() && byteCache == null)
103         byteCache = readBytes(content(), getMaxLength());
104      if (byteCache != null)
105         return byteCache;
106      return readBytes(content());
107   }
108
109   @Override /* HttpEntity */
110   public boolean isRepeatable() {
111      return true;
112   }
113
114   @Override /* HttpEntity */
115   public long getContentLength() {
116      return content().length();
117   }
118
119   @Override /* HttpEntity */
120   public InputStream getContent() throws IOException {
121      if (isCached())
122         return new ByteArrayInputStream(asBytes());
123      return new FileInputStream(content());
124   }
125
126   @Override /* HttpEntity */
127   public void writeTo(OutputStream out) throws IOException {
128      Utils.assertArgNotNull("out", out);
129
130      if (isCached()) {
131         out.write(asBytes());
132      } else {
133         try (InputStream is = getContent()) {
134            IOUtils.pipe(is, out, getMaxLength());
135         }
136      }
137   }
138
139   // <FluentSetters>
140
141   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
142   public FileEntity setCached() throws IOException{
143      super.setCached();
144      return this;
145   }
146
147   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
148   public FileEntity setCharset(Charset value) {
149      super.setCharset(value);
150      return this;
151   }
152
153   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
154   public FileEntity setChunked() {
155      super.setChunked();
156      return this;
157   }
158
159   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
160   public FileEntity setChunked(boolean value) {
161      super.setChunked(value);
162      return this;
163   }
164
165   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
166   public FileEntity setContent(Object value) {
167      super.setContent(value);
168      return this;
169   }
170
171   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
172   public FileEntity setContent(Supplier<?> value) {
173      super.setContent(value);
174      return this;
175   }
176
177   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
178   public FileEntity setContentEncoding(String value) {
179      super.setContentEncoding(value);
180      return this;
181   }
182
183   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
184   public FileEntity setContentEncoding(ContentEncoding value) {
185      super.setContentEncoding(value);
186      return this;
187   }
188
189   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
190   public FileEntity setContentLength(long value) {
191      super.setContentLength(value);
192      return this;
193   }
194
195   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
196   public FileEntity setContentType(String value) {
197      super.setContentType(value);
198      return this;
199   }
200
201   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
202   public FileEntity setContentType(ContentType value) {
203      super.setContentType(value);
204      return this;
205   }
206
207   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
208   public FileEntity setMaxLength(int value) {
209      super.setMaxLength(value);
210      return this;
211   }
212
213   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.entity.BasicHttpEntity */
214   public FileEntity setUnmodifiable() {
215      super.setUnmodifiable();
216      return this;
217   }
218
219   // </FluentSetters>
220}
